title: Wout van Aert Blames GC Riders for Giro d’Italia Crash Chaos, Denies Visma Pushed Advantage
content:
VIDEO: Fans capture different angles of decisive crash at the Giro d'Italia that shakes up GC as Van Aert denies unfair advantage: 'We were here to win the stage.'

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Blames GC Riders for Giro d’Italia Crash Chaos, Denies Visma Pushed Advantage on Velo.
author: ahood
